Question: This person was made President of the Royal Society in 1703 and an associate of the French Académie des Sciences.
Hints: Before ****, it had typically been assumed that a planet orbiting the Sun would need a forward force to keep it moving.
In his Hypothesis of Light of 1675, this person posited the existence of the ether to transmit forces between particles.
In 1691, Duillier started to write a new version of this person's Principia, and corresponded with Leibniz.
